import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useLocation, useParams } from "react-router"; import "./css/user.css"; import Modal from "./Modal"; export default function User() { const data = useLocation(); console.log(data.user); const user = data.user; const [modal,setModal]=useState(false) return (

User

{/* */}
Name {user.fname + " " + user.lname}
Email {user.email}
Address {user.address}
); }
